Review_Text: Another bad liberal policy movie, one of many that always leave me smh - if Congress and the President cannot lower gun violence, how can one person with a voice stop it? A look into the seamy side of New Orleans and about what you would expect. How does one combat gun violence? There are literally millions of guns on the streets and in American homes. It is a futile impossibility and logistically impossible. An old fable with a new face. Next.
